name: Dummy Beat-up
description:
Just have fun beating up a boss that literally does nothing xD

There is a problem though: when you get out of the edge you don't fall. That's because the player and enemy has kinematic rigidbodies. The invisible barriers are also not working. Sorry! I'm trying to fix this glitch.

Please fullscreen for good results.

---CONTROLS!---

Controller controls written support XBox 1.

AD, left or right arrow keys, and left thumbstick on controller to move.

Space or X to attack.

Beat the "boss" up!

And have fun (try to, I admit it's very bad).
